description: Every 24 hours, your 3 lowest level Alchemy Bubbles gets +1 Lv. This only applies to bubbles Lv 5 or higher, so it's more like 'your lowest level bubble that is at least level 5'

Every 24 hours, your 3 lowest level Alchemy Bubbles gets +1 Lv. This only applies to bubbles Lv 5 or higher, so it's more like 'your lowest level bubble that is at least level 5'. ALSO, it only works on the first 15 bubbles of each colour!
